node.address: Cartagena Centro Amurallado, Calle 1ra De Badillo # 35-46 , Cartagena, Colombia

content.value:
Hostal Don Miguel is located in the historic city of Cartagena de Indias, we also known as the walled city, we are a family-style accommodation with a prime location which guarantees in a few minutes by walk to most places of tourist interest.

We have 8 private rooms , with private bathroom, cable TV, air conditioning in diverse Accommodations (double, triple, quadruple) and also we have 4 bedrooms each one with 5 beds, fans, shared bathrooms, a common TV and food area.

Hostal Don Miguel Cartagena de Indias is located in Cartagena’s historic walled city, 400 m from the Convention Center and 250 m from the Torre del Reloj. The property offers free WiFi access, natural lighting and a shared TV room.
Some rooms at Hostal Don Migues Cartagena de Indias have air conditioning. A private bathroom with shower is included. Bed linen and towels are provided.
At Hostal Don Miguel Cartagena de Indias you will find a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. A wide variety of restaurants and bars can be reached within a 2-minute walk.
Bocagrande and Marbella beaches are located within a 5-minute drive, while Rafael Nuñez International Airport is only 5 km away.

description.description: Hostal Don Miguel is located on a republican type of two-story buildings, this property was originally acquired by Mr. Miguel Dau Dabbas over 80 years ago and to this day preserved as family property, in the beginning the property was used for business office until two years ago the family started the business of accommodation and lodging.
